attributes.long-description:
Carlos Calaca has kidnapped El Presidente's Daughter, and he plans to sacrifice her in order to merge the Worlds of the Living and the Dead.

Juan Aguacate, an agave farmer who stumbles upon a Legendary Luchador mask, must find the strength and courage to stop him.

Travel through a mystical and mysterious Mexican world as a Luchador using the power of your two fists to battle evil. Uncover hidden wrestling techniques like the Rooster Uppercut, and Dimension Swap to open new areas and secrets.

Purchase of the PlayStation®Vita version of this game entitles you to download the PlayStation®3 version of this game at no extra cost.

Key Features:
- Use combat moves for fighting enemies and platforming
- Swap between overlapping dimensions (Worlds of the Living and Dead)
- Cross-Save! Continue your progress across platforms
- PlayStation®TV compatibility (including PS TV local co-op support)
- Chickens. Lots and lots of Chickens

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
Network Features
1000KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks
Cross-platform play (PS3™)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). This item may be solely used on up to 2 PlayStation® systems activated by this account, with no more than 1 activated device within a 24 hour period.  Content may not be used by any other account.  Please see software description for device compatibility.
